name: Hadi Dovus
description:
A Local 2 player free-to-play fighter, currently under development.  

Take Control of Murat or Simel, strangers turned rivals. Brought to compete in an ancient  tournament by force The last survivor, to be hailed champion and to have their greatest desire granted.

Controls: 

P1: W A S D to Move

E "Light Punch" T "Heavy Punch"

Q "Fire Ball"
